pollDescription: This poll contains a lot of content related questions and will ultimately determine the direction we go when developing Revenant for the next days.

questions.question: Should Revenants be added to Revenant to match osrs?
Would you prefer us to fix bugs or work on some new content for the Server?
Should we add more Mid tier gear such as Black dhide to the ranger shop?'
Should Corp drop rates be nerfed?
Should Wizard distentor's position be changed to outside the bank, near the well?
Should a boss teleport from Wizard distentor be added for Abyssal Sire?
Do you want to see a detailed Halloween event or more of a basic one?
